ResMed S9 Escape™ CPAPPaula,36001,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,ResMed,"<div id=""Overview"">

column2: s SleepSeeker!

column1: • Meets the FAA requirements for all phases of air travel

The ResMed S9 series offers an intuitive, colorful, and stylish look.  With four clearly marked buttons and a large color display, adjusting settings has never been easier.  A large push dial allows you to scroll through screens and make changes easily.  The large color screen allows you know where you are scrolling and what setting you are adjusting by changing colors.  The info button allows you to view compliance data and reports with a single push, and the large start button offers an easy one touch start.
The sleek low profile design makes your CPAP look less like a sterile medical device and more like a standard bedside clock radio, further encouraging you to be consistent in using your therapy.

ResMed introduces its new SlimLine Tubing with the S9 series machines.  Exclusive to ResMed the SlimLine Tubing is 40% lighter, 20% thinner, and takes up 35% less space.  Providing more flexibility and less drag with light weight materials, the SlimLine Tubing promises to be a favorite among CPAP users.  In addition to this, ResMed introduces a smart-fit cuff design that makes it easier to attach and remove the tube from your mask and machine.
By enhancing the Easy-Breath motor with axial air-flow, foam, and noise isolating materials, ResMed has created an ultra quite CPAP machine.  Measured at 24dBA (that&#x2019
column2: s no louder than normal breathing!), you or your bed partner will never be awoken by your noisy CPAP machine.

column1: All the S9 series machines come with onboard and removable data storage.  With a touch of the info button you will see a snapshot of your therapy.  Data is stored on board for up to 365 days and includes average usage, used hours, days used, run hours, pressures.  The removable SD card provides detailed graphical data and high resolution flow data that your physician can read.
By reducing pressure during exhalation, the patented EPR Easy-Breathe technology makes the adjustment to CPAP therapy easier and more natural for the user.

• Machine TypeCPAP
  • Brand/Manufacturer:ResMed
  • Weight:1.85 lb
  • Dimensions:5.75"

The ResMed S9 series offers an intuitive, colorful, and stylish look.  With four clearly marked buttons and a large color display, adjusting settings has never been easier.  A large push dial allows you to scroll through screens and make changes easily.  The large color screen allows you know where you are scrolling and what setting you are adjusting by changing colors.  The info button allows you to view compliance data and reports with a single push, and the large start button offers an easy one touch start.
The sleek low profile design makes your CPAP look less like a sterile medical device and more like a standard bedside clock radio, further encouraging you to be consistent in using your therapy.

A new feature for the S9 series machines is the H5i humidifier.  This humidifier adapts to the specific environment of your bedroom and adjusts the heat and humidification, so you receive the exact heat and humidification that you select on your machine

ResMed introduces its new SlimLine Tubing with the S9 series machines.  Exclusive to ResMed the SlimLine Tubing is 40% lighter, 20% thinner, and takes up 35% less space.  Providing more flexibility and less drag with light weight materials, the SlimLine Tubing promises to be a favorite among CPAP users.  In addition to this, ResMed introduces a smart-fit cuff design that makes it easier to attach and remove the tube from your mask and machine.
By enhancing the Easy-Breath motor with axial air-flow, foam, and noise isolating materials, ResMed has created an ultra quite CPAP machine.  Measured at 24dBA (that&#x2019

ResMed S8 Escape™ II CPAP with Easy-BreathePaula,33051,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,ResMed,"<div id=""Overview"">
• ResMed S8 Escape II has improved motor design that outputs only 24 decibels at 10 cmH2O, making the CPAP machine 75% quieter than the original S8 Elite.
• The S8 Escape II provides reminders for accessory replacements, and also has the advantages of remote downloading capabilities utilizing the ResScan Data Card which provides compliance data.

column2: s Easy-Breathe technology, a 75% quieter motor and improved EPR (Expiratory Pressure Relief) mode allows for a drop in pressure upon exhalation making patients exhalation feel more natural.

column1: • Compact and robust, makes the ResMed S8 series a portable and user friendly CPAP machine.
• ResMed S8 Escape II has Automatic Altitude Adjustment ensuring correct pressure is given while traveling.

column2: s S8 Escape II comes with a built in power supply which automatically detects the DC input.  This is ideal for travel. (Caution: ResMed&apos
column3: s DC 12-Volt Converter must be used with any battery source.)

column2: s S8 Escape II automatically converts from 110V to 220V while traveling abroad.

column1: The ResMed S8 Escape II CPAP Machine with Easy-Breathe Technology and EPR (Expiratory Pressure Relief) allows for better patient compliance and easier patient exhalation making for a more natural nights sleep. ResMed has set a new industry standard in quiet, reliable, and comfortable sleep therapy.

column2: s new sophisticated dual motor design delivers superior

column1: performance at a lower effort while cutting device noise
significantly at only 24 decibels. By reducing pressure during exhalation, the patented EPR Easy-Breathe technology makes the adjustment to CPAP therapy easier and more natural for the CPAP user.

column2: s improved EPR with Easy-Breathe

column1: delivered in a smooth waveform that mimics patient
breathing. With a choice of three different EPR comfort
levels (1, 2, and 3 cmH2O relief per breath), the S8 Escape II with Easy-Breathe technology allows
customized comfort for breathing that feels more natural.

column2: s ResScan Data Card allows for remote downloading of patients compliance. The compact design allows for easier traveling and home use.  Optional integrated heated humidification can be added to the S8 Escape II. This CPAP machine rates as one of the best CPAP machines on the market today. Pressure ranges can be set between 4 and 20 cmH2O and can be used with any manufactures CPAP mask. This CPAP machine comes with a 6 foot hose, filters, and a convenient carrying bag.

ResMed S9 Escape™ CPAP w/H5i™  Humidifier and ClimateLine™  TubePaula,36021,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,ResMed,"<div id=""Overview"">

column2: s SleepSeeker!

column1: • Meets the FAA requirements for all phases of air travel

The ResMed S9 series offers an intuitive, colorful, and stylish look.  With four clearly marked buttons and a large color display, adjusting settings has never been easier.  A large push dial allows you to scroll through screens and make changes easily.  The large color screen allows you know where you are scrolling and what setting you are adjusting by changing colors.  The info button allows you to view compliance data and reports with a single push, and the large start button offers an easy one touch start.
The sleek low profile design makes your CPAP look less like a sterile medical device and more like a standard bedside clock radio, further encouraging you to be consistent in using your therapy.

A new feature for the S9 series machines is a climate control.  This feature adapts to the specific environment of your bedroom and adjusts the heat and humidification at the mask, so you receive the exact heat and humidification that you select on your machine.  ResMed used their special ClimateLine Heated Tubing that has a thermostat at the end of the tubing to measure the temperature at the mask.  If the temperature has dropped between the humidifier and the mask, the tubing will heat the air to your select temperature.  By doing this, ResMed has nearly eliminated rainout caused by changing temperatures in your tubing.  Also, your H5i humidifier will measure the ambient temperature and humidity in the bedroom and adjust its output accordingly.

With all of the advantages of the SlimLine Tubing, the ClimateLine Heated Tubing works in harmony with your H5i humidifier to give you measured and controlled heat and humidification at the mask, virtually eliminating rain out.  (Can only be used with the Climate Control System)
By enhancing the Easy-Breath motor with axial air-flow, foam, and noise isolating materials, ResMed has created an ultra quite CPAP machine.  Measured at 24dBA (that&#x2019
column2: s no louder than normal breathing!), you or your bed partner will never be awoken by your noisy CPAP machine.

column1: All the S9 series machines come with onboard and removable data storage.  With a touch of the info button you will see a snapshot of your therapy.  Data is stored on board for up to 365 days and includes average usage, used hours, days used, run hours, pressures, leak and AHI information.  The removable SD card provides detailed graphical data and high resolution flow data that your physician can read.
By reducing pressure during exhalation, the patented EPR Easy-Breathe technology makes the adjustment to CPAP therapy easier and more natural for the user.

column1: ResMed S8 Escape™ II CPAP with Easy-Breathe and H4i™ Heated Humidifier,33061,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,ResMed,"<div id=""Overview"">
• ResMed S8 Escape II has improved motor design that outputs only 24 decibels at 10 cmH2O, making the CPAP machine 75% quieter than the original S8 Elite.
• The H4i integrated heated humidification has 5 heat settings to allow for maximum comfort.
• The S8 Escape II provides reminders for accessory replacements, and also has the advantages of remote downloading capabilities utilizing the ResScan Data Card which provides compliance data.

column2: s Easy-Breathe technology, a 75% quieter motor and improved EPR (Expiratory Pressure Relief) mode allows for a drop in pressure upon exhalation making patients exhalation feel more natural.

column1: • Compact and robust, makes the ResMed S8 series a portable and user friendly CPAP machine.
• ResMed S8 Escape II has Automatic Altitude Adjustment ensuring correct pressure is given while traveling.

column2: s S8 Escape II comes with a built in power supply which automatically detects the DC input.  This is ideal for travel. (Caution: ResMed&apos
column3: s DC 12-Volt Converter must be used with any battery source.)

column2: s S8 Escape II automatically converts from 110V to 220V while traveling abroad.

column1: The ResMed S8 Escape II CPAP Machine with H4i heated humidifier, Easy-Breathe Technology and EPR (Expiratory Pressure Relief) allows for better patient compliance and easier patient exhalation making for a more natural nights sleep. ResMed S9 Elite™ CPAP w/H5i™ Humidifier,36013,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,ResMed,"<div id=""Overview"">

column2: s SleepSeeker!

column1: • H5i heated humidification adjusts to the humidity in your bedroom to deliver the most accurate humidification
• Programmable mask fit system (Nasal, Pillows, Full Face)
• Meets the FAA requirements for all phases of air travel

column2: CPAP with H5i&#x2122
column4: offers an intuitive, colorful, and stylish look.  With four clearly marked buttons and a large color display, adjusting settings has never been easier.  A large push dial allows you to scroll through screens and make changes easily.  The large color screen allows you know where you are scrolling and what setting you are adjusting by changing colors.  The info button allows you to view compliance data and reports with a single push, and the large start button offers an easy one touch start.

column1: The sleek low profile design makes your CPAP look less like a sterile medical device and more like a standard bedside clock radio, further encouraging you to be consistent in using your therapy.

A new feature for the S9 series machines is the H5i humidifier.  This humidifier adapts to the specific environment of your bedroom and adjusts the heat and humidification, so you receive the exact heat and humidification that you select on your machine.

ResMed introduces its new SlimLine Tubing with the S9 series machines.  Exclusive to ResMed the SlimLine Tubing is 40% lighter, 20% thinner, and takes up 35% less space.  Providing more flexibility and less drag with light weight materials, the SlimLine Tubing promises to be a favorite among CPAP users.  In addition to this, ResMed introduces a smart-fit cuff design that makes it easier to attach and remove the tube from your mask and machine.
By enhancing the Easy-Breath motor with axial air-flow, foam, and noise isolating materials, ResMed has created an ultra quite CPAP machine.  Measured at 24dBA (that&#x2019
column2: s no louder than normal breathing!), you or your bed partner will never be awoken by your noisy CPAP machine.

the S9 Elite have CSA (Central Sleep Apnea) and OSA (Obstructive Sleep Apnea) detection.  The enhanced Easy-Breathe motor features small diameter lightweight impellers that provide lower inertia. This enables the motor to track your normal breathing waveform and produce the small oscillations in pressure required to detect CSAs.   It uses the forced oscillation technique (FOT) to determine the state of the airway during an apnea. When an apnea is detected, small oscillations are added to the pressure to measure airway patency. The CSA algorithm uses the resulting flow and pressure to measure airway patency and differentiate central and obstructive events.  Your S9 AutoSet has the ability to compensate for these events with its enhanced autoset algorithm.

column1: All the S9 series machines come with onboard and removable data storage.  With a touch of the info button you will see a snapshot of your therapy.  Data is stored on board for up to 365 days and includes average usage, used hours, days used, run hours, pressures, leak and AHI information.  The removable SD card provides detailed graphical data and high resolution flow data that your physician can read.
By reducing pressure during exhalation, the patented EPR Easy-Breathe technology makes the adjustment to CPAP therapy easier and more natural for the user.

Do you ever have trouble knowing if your mask has a sufficient seal?  With the Mask Fit option, your machine will run a quick diagnostic to let you know if your seal is sufficient.  Simply select what type of mask you are using (Full Face, Nasal, or Nasal Pillows) put your mask on, from the Home screen push and hold the dial for three seconds.  Your machine will perform a short 3 minute diagnostic and you will see on the display an &#x201C
column2: Adjust&#x201D
column4: Good&#x201D
column5: indicator, letting you know if you have a good fit.

column1: ResMed S8 Elite™ II CPAP with Easy-Breathe and H4i™ Heated HumidifierPaula,33062,simple,1,BiPAP Mashine,ResMed,"<div id=""Overview"">
• ResMed S8 Elite II has improved motor design that outputs only 24 decibels at 10 cmH2O, making the CPAP machine 75% quieter than the original S8 Elite.
• The H4i integrated heated humidification has 5 heat settings to allow for maximum comfort.

• The S8 Elite II provides reminders for accessory replacements, and also has the advantages of remote downloading capabilities utilizing the ResScan Data Card which provides efficacy and usage data that tracks therapy effectiveness, compliance data, and patient trends.

column2: s Easy-Breathe technology, a 75% quieter motor and improved EPR (Expiratory Pressure Relief) mode allows for a drop in pressure upon exhalation making patients exhalation feel more natural.

column1: • Compact and robust, makes the ResMed S8 series a portable and user friendly CPAP machine.
• ResMed S8 Elite II has Automatic Altitude Adjustment ensuring correct pressure is given while traveling.

column2: s S8 Elite II comes with a built in power supply which automatically detects the DC input.  This is ideal for travel. (Caution: ResMed&apos
column3: s DC 12-Volt Converter must be used with any battery source.)

column2: s S8 Elite II automatically converts from 110V to 220V while traveling abroad.

column1: The ResMed S8 Elite II CPAP Machine with H4i heated humidifier, Easy-Breathe Technology and EPR (Expiratory Pressure Relief) allows for better patient compliance and easier patient exhalation making for a more natural nights sleep. ResMed has set a new industry standard in quiet, reliable, and comfortable sleep therapy. ResMed&apos
column2: s integrated H4i heated humidification allows for maximum moisture comfort that prevents patients from experiencing dryness and irritation. ResMed&#x2019
column3: s new sophisticated dual motor design delivers superior

column1: performance at a lower effort while cutting device noise
significantly at only 24 decibels. By reducing pressure during exhalation, the patented EPR Easy-Breathe technology makes the adjustment to CPAP therapy easier and more natural for the CPAP user.

column2: s improved EPR with Easy-Breathe

column1: delivered in a smooth waveform that mimics patient
breathing. With a choice of three different EPR comfort
levels (1, 2, and 3 cmH2O relief per breath), the S8 Elite II with Easy-Breathe technology allows
customized comfort for breathing that feels more natural.

column2: s ResScan Data Card allows for remote downloading of patients compliance and efficacy data. The compact design allows for easier traveling and home use.  Optional integrated heated humidification can be added to the S8 Elite II. This CPAP machine rates as one of the best CPAP machines on the market today. Pressure ranges can be set between 4 and 20 cmH2O and can be used with any manufactures CPAP mask. This CPAP machine comes with a 6 foot hose, filters, and a convenient carrying bag.

• Machine TypeCPAP
  • Brand/Manufacturer:ResMed
  • Weight:4.6 lb
  • Dimensions:4.6"
column2: x 6.7&quot
column4:
• Noise Level:24 dB
  • Warranty:2 Year
  • Data Card:Yes
  • Software Available:No
  • Ramp:0 to 45 min. (5-minute increments)
  • Exhalation Relief:EPR
  • Pressure Range:4-20 cm/H2O

  • 110 Voltage:Yes
  • 220 Voltage:Yes

  • Product Condition:New
  • Other Information:Includes EPR with Easy-Breathe exhalation relief, includes full compliance and efficacy data recording within the machine (365 days of data recorded).
  • HCPCS Reimbursement Code:E0601, E0562
  • Prescription Required:Yes
